data.caption: Outcome Of The 354Th Board Meeting Held On 23Rd May, 2023
data.news_body:
Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for year ended on 31st March, 2023 and the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the 4th quarter and year ended 31st March, 2023.
Considered and recommended, subject to the approval of Shareholders, a dividend, for the financial year ended on 31st March, 2023, @ 10% (i.e. Re. 1/- per Equity Share) on the face value of Rs. 10/- per Equity Share.
Other business arising out of the above business and incidental and ancillary to the Company's business.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 3Rd Quarter Ended On 31St December, 2022 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body:
With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit following documents for your kind perusal and records.

- Copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 3rd quarter ended on 31st December, 2022, along with Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (''Listing Regulations'')
data.news_body: With reference to the abovementioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 30th September, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 2Nd  Quarter Ended On 30Th September, 2022 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body:
With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit following documents for your kind perusal and records.

- Copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited Half Yearly Financial Results of the Company for 2nd quarter ended on 30th September, 2022, along with Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 1St Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2022 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 1st quarter ended on 30th June, 2022, along with Limited Review Report thereon

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: With reference to the abovementioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 31st March, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Revised Standalone Cash Flow Statement For The Year Ended On 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby inform you that there is an error in the submission of the Standalone Cash Flow Statement. We have submitted the Standalone Cash Flow Statement for the financial year 2020-21 instead of 2021-22. Therefore, we hereby submit the same for the financial year 2021-22.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 4Th Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2022 Along With Auditor'S Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Audited Quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 4th quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2022, along with Auditor's Report thereon.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 3Rd Quarter Ended On 31St December, 2021 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 3rd quarter ended on 31st December, 2021, along with Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: With reference to the abovementioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 30th September, 2021

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 2Nd Quarter And Half Year Ended On 30Th September, 2021 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 2nd quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021, along with Limited Review Report thereon

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 1St Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2021 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Unaudited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 1st quarter ended on 30th June, 2021, along with Limited Review Report thereon

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: With reference to the abovementioned subject and pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby enclose disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the half year ended 31st March, 2021, in the format specified in the accounting standards.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results For The 4Th Quarter And Year Ended On 31St March, 2021 Along With Auditor'S Report
data.news_body: With reference to the aforementioned subject, we hereby submit copy of the Standalone & Consolidated Audited quarterly Financial Results of the Company for 4th quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2021, along with Auditor's Report thereon.
